en.today: You may feel slightly dazed as the moon moves through ethereal Pisces, dear Aries, unlocking new layers of the imagination. Truly brilliant visions will manifest if you escape into your own mind, though you should avoid becoming completely detached. As the nodes of fate activate this afternoon, floating through tasks could trigger mistakes that escalate into significant issues down the line. Failing to sketch, outline, or document ideas will also cause them to slip away. Feed inspiration with concrete action when Luna squares Mars this evening, but try not to skip steps or bite off more than you can chew.

en.today: Your emotions evolve under the Pisces moon, dear Leo, sharpening your instincts and desire to be better. As new information rises to the surface, you'll benefit from enlightening others on your own thoughts and feelings. Luna aligns with the nodes of fate this afternoon, helping you spring toward opportunities or commitments you've been laying the groundwork for. Be mindful that some adjustments may be necessary to reach agreements that everyone can be satisfied with. Tension builds while Mars stirs this evening, and knee-jerk reactions to conflict may quickly lead to regrets. Should drama arise, take a moment to catch your breath before addressing the issue.

en.today: You'll have a gift for connecting others as the moon moves through Pisces, dear Taurus, finding pleasure with each introduction you make. In turn, your reputation grows as peers become aware of the breadth and diversity of your network. Your influence increases once the nodes of fate stir this afternoon, but you should consider what you have to gain by learning from others as well. Humanitarian efforts also come into focus, tugging at your heartstrings and inspiring meaningful action. Steer clear of conflict when Luna squares Mars this evening, especially where ex-partnerships or political differences are concerned.

en.today: Trust your intuition as the moon continues through psychic Pisces, dear Gemini, especially where professional aspirations are concerned. Tap into the emotions and subtle energy that permeate your work environment, looking for opportunities to be helpful, make friends, or offer support. Your climb to the top accelerates if your goals stem from the soul. If you haven't yet found your calling, reflect on whether there's a better way forward. Family responsibilities may feel like a burden while the nodes of fate are activated, but remember that it's essential to take charge of your own happiness. Just be mindful to keep loved ones in the loop before making drastic decisions.
